description: Associates the specified service with the specified service network. For more information, see Manage service associations in the Amazon VPC Lattice User Guide. You can't use this operation if the service and service network are already associated or if there is a disassociation or deletion in progress. If the association fails, you can retry the operation by deleting the association and recreating it. You cannot associate a service and service network that are shared with a caller. The caller must own either the service or the service network. As a result of this operation, the association is created in the service network account and the association owner account.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you retry a request that completed successfully using the same client token and parameters, the retry succeeds without performing any actions. If the parameters aren't identical, the retry fails. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: serviceIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the service.

parameters.name: serviceNetworkIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the service network. You must use an ARN if the resources are in different accounts.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags for the association. (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 128 Unicode characters. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @ May not begin with aws:. (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters. : / = + - @

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the association.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The account that created the association.

nested_items.name: customDomainName
nested_items.description: The custom domain name of the service.

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of the service.

nested_items.name: hostedZoneId
nested_items.description: The ID of the hosted zone.
